article_title: Google and LG to Release Smartwatch
article_text:
Google Inc. looks set to beat Apple Inc. to market in a new category of mobile devices—smartwatches.

LG Electronics Inc. and Google's Motorola unit on Tuesday said they would begin selling smartwatches in coming months that run on a new version of Google's Android operating system for wearable devices, Android Wear. LG worked closely with Google on the design of the watch, which LG will call the G Watch, and Motorola, the Moto...
